ing: 1/2 (2 liter) bottle caffeinated citrus-flavored soda (such as Mountain DewÂ®)
1 cup lime sherbet, or to taste
des: "A terrific, fun, and delicious drink for any halloween party! Tastes great, too. Very easy to make as well."
ins: Place ice in a large punch bowl. Pour in the citrus-flavored soda and lime juice. Stir in the lime sherbet.
